articles.description: Simone Biles wins the all-around title for her sixth Olympic gold and becomes the oldest winner of the event for 72 years.
articles.title: Simone Biles wins all-around title for sixth Olympic gold

articles.description: Algerian boxer Imane Khelif is through to the quarter-finals of the women's 66kg at the Olympics after Italy's Angela Carini abandons their bout inside 46 seconds.
articles.title: Olympics boxing: Imane Khelif progresses after opponent abandons

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: Andy Murray was understandably emotional as his illustrious career came to a close at the Paris 2024 Olympics - but he wasn't the only one.
articles.title: Andy Murray retirement: Tears everywhere as British sporting icon ends career at Paris 2024

articles.description: Team GB's rowers clinched three more medals on day six in Paris, while Andy Murray and Dan Evans continue their doubles campaign later.
articles.title: Paris Olympics: Three medals for Team GB rowers on day six

articles.description: Katie Ledecky becomes the United States' most decorated female Olympian as Great Britain's women finish fifth in the 4x200m freestyle relay - and France's Leon Marchand reaches yet another final.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Katie Ledecky makes US Olympic history, Leon Marchand reaches another final

articles.description: Former Leicester City manager Craig Shakespeare has died at the age of 60, his family have announced.
articles.title: Craig Shakespeare: Former Leicester City boss dies aged 60

articles.description: BBC tennis correspondent Russell Fuller writes about his experience of getting to know Andy Murray throughout his career.
articles.title: Andy Murray: 'Compelling on and off court' - a decade on tour with two-time Wimbledon champion

articles.description: Polish top seed Iga Swiatek sees her 25-match winning streak on the Paris clay ended by China's Zheng Qinwen in the Olympics semi-finals.
articles.title: Olympics tennis: Iga Swiatek loses to Zheng Qinwen at Paris 2024
